page.title: 03RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: Many peoples leisure time is spent at home with the family or watching T.V..But the area boasts many public houses and fields for outdoor recreation.There are parks some with swings and slides.At Brown Leesthere is a disused railway line which children could play in.The Newcastle Borough Council provides football pitches some with lighting and tennis courts. Pub.amusements vary from fruit machines to darts.There are Brownies and Guides.Youth Clubs provide discos,night classes are held in schools in the evenings. B.M.X. bike tracks are important for boys who practice ,some of the smaller cmmunities boast a community centre or aworking mans club.Swimming and fishing are also popular.
